Overload.descr: Depreciated. Use AttachPropToProp instead.

AutoComplete.KeyWord: <Overload retVal="void" descr="Apply a force to a given body. An entity body is referenced as _.">
<Overload retVal="void" descr="Apply an impulse to a given body. An entity body is referenced as _" >

Overload.descr: Calls the specified function when the player combines items in the inventory. Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asItemA, string &in asItemB)
Prints a string to the debug console.
Adds a diary to the player's journal.
Adds a voice and an effect to the effect voice queue.
Adds a patrol node to the enemy's path.
Calls a function when two entites collide. asChildName does not support *. alStates 1:enter -1:leave 0:both Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asParent, string &in asChild, int alState)
Adds a float to an existing global (cross-map) float variable.
Adds an int to an existing global (cross-map) int variable.
Appends a string to an existing global (cross-map) string variable.
Justine function. Behaviour undocumented.
Adds a float to an existing local (map-scope) float variable.
Adds a int to an existing local (map-scope) int variable.
Appends a string to an existing local (map-scope) string variable.
Adds a note to the player's journal.
Add a force to the player body. Values below ~2k will have little effect by default.
Gives the player health.
Gives the player oil.
Gives the player sanity.
Apply a force to a given entity.
Gives health to an entity.
Apply an impulse to a given entity.
Adds a quest to the player's journal.
Creates a timer which calls a function when it expires. Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asTimer)
Calls a function when the player uses an item on an entity. Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asItem, string &in asEntity)
Gives the specified enemy the player's current position and makes it search the area.
Attaches a body to a StickyArea.
Creates and attaches a prop to another prop.
Attaches a prop to a StickyArea.
Saves the game to the auto save.
Blocks a hint from being shown.
Breaks a joint. Do not use this where the joint is part of an interaction (e.g. doors).
Load the specified map.
Changes the pose of the specifed ManPig. asPoseType Can be 'Biped' or 'Quadruped'.
Reverts player state. Will make the player drop items, detatch from ladders etc.
Sets a checkpoint and callback triggered on respawn. Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asName, int alCount)
Clears the current path of patrol nodes of the enemy.
Removes save-data regarding other maps to reduce size of future save files.
Completes a quest.
Link the changes in state of one entity to another. Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asConnectionName, string &in asMainEntity, string &in asConnectEntity, int alState)
Caches all current textures models until destroy is called.
Creates an entity at an area.
Creates a particle system on an entity.
Creates a particle system on an entity.
Destroys cache created by CreateDataCache().
Destroys a particle system.
Detaches everything from a StickyArea.
Disables the death sound when the player is killed.
Exits the inventory by force.
Instantly fades an enemy to smoke.
Influences the global sound speed.
Influences the global sound volume.
Applies the image trail effect to the screen.
Fades the screen back to normal.
Fades in a sound.
Changes the properties of a light.
Fades the screen to black.
Changes the aspect ratio of the camera.
Changes the field of view of the camera.
Rotates the position of the camera on the player's body.
Applies radial blur effects to the screen.
Applies a sepia effect to the screen.
Forces the specified tesla pig to become visible for a short duration.
Gets the mass of the specified body.
Returns true if EffectVoices are still active.
Returns the name of the state the enemy is currently in.
Returns true if specified entities collides. Does not support *.
Returns true if specified entity exists.
Returns x position of specified entity.
Returns y position of specified entity.
Returns z position of specified entity.
Returns true if a flashback is still in effect.
Returns a global (cross-map) float variable's value.
Returns a global (cross-map) int variable's value.
Returns a global (cross-map) string variable's value.
Returns true if the lantern is turned on.
Return the state of a lever (1: at max, -1: at min, 0: otherwise)
Returns a local (map-scope) float variable's value.
Returns a local (map-scope) int variable's value.
Returns a local (map-scope) string variable's value.
Returns the Player health amount.
Returns the Player oil amount.
Returns x position of the player.
Returns y position of the player.
Returns z position of of the player.
Returns the Player sanity amount.
Returns Player's speed.
Returns the Player's vertical speed.
Returns the health for a specified entity.
Returns true if the specified entity is being held by the player.
Returns true if the specified swing door is closed.
Returns true if the specified swing door is locked.
Return the state of the swing door (1: at max, -1: at min, 0: otherwise).
Return the amount of time remaining for the given timer.
Displays a hint on the player's screen.
Adds an item to the player's inventory. The item does not have to exist as entity in the world.
Adds a single item to the player's inventory by using it's entity file.
Reduces the health of the player.

Param.name: string& asType - BloodSplat, Claws or Slash

Overload.descr: Boosts the player's sanity by a fixed amount.
Boosts the player's sanity by a fixed amount.
Reduces the sanity of the player.
Returns true if the inventory contains the specified item.
Returns true if the specified insanity event is active.
Connects a prop with the movement of a MoveObject.
Connects a prop with the movement of a rope (E.g. turn wheel to move rope).
Returns the absolute value of afX.
Calculates the arc cosine of afX.
Calculates the arc sine of afX.
Calculates the arc tangent of afX.
Calculates the arc tangent of afX/afY.
Returns afX clamped to afMin and afMax.
Calculates the cosine of afX.
Returns the largest value.
Returns the smallest value.
Returns afBase raised to the power of afExp.
Calculates the sine of afX.
Calculates the square root of afX.
Calculates the tangent of afX.
Moves the player forward by specified amount in one timestep.
Changes the position of the camera on the player's body.
Places the specifed entity at the position of another enity.
Plays a sound, not using 3D.
Plays a music file.
Makes the prop play an animation, triggering a callback when finished. Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asProp)
Creates a sound on an entity.
Preloads a particle system.
Preloads a sound.
Prints a string to the log.
Returns true if the specified quest is added.
Returns true if the specified quest is complete.
Generates a random float. Inclusive lower & upper bounds.
Generates a random integer. Inclusive lower & upper bounds.
Detaches a prop from a prop.
Removes a combine callback. See also: AddCombineCallback
Removes an EntityCollideCallback. asChildName does not support *.
Removes a hint.
Removes an item from the player's inventory.
Removes a timer.
Removes an item callback.
Removes the specified entity and places a new entity at its location.
Resets an entity's state to how it was when the entity was created.
Only called in the pickup diary callback. If true the journal displays the entry.
Rotates the prop up to a set speed.
Returns true if debug mode is enabled.
Set if a StickyArea should allow entites to become attached/stuck.
Sets the mass of the specified body.
Set a button entity switched on/off
Sets the message that appears when the player dies.
Sets the function to be called when the EffectVoices are finished. Callback syntax: void Foo()
Set whether or not an Enemy is Disabled
Enables or disables enemy triggers. If disabled, the enemy will ignore the player.
Set if the enemy a hallucination or not.
Enables/disables the sanity drain of the specified entity.
Set whether or not an entity is active.
Calls a function when certain entity events happen. Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asEntity, string &in type) - Type depends on entity type, includes: OnPickup, Break, OnIgnite
A callback called when ever the connection state changes (e.g. lever pulled) Callback syntax: void Func(string &in asEntity, int alState) - alState 1: at max, -1: at min, 0: otherwise
Changes the crosshair that is used when focusing an entity.

Param.name: string& asCrossHair - Default, Grab, Push, Ignite, Pick, LevelDoor, Ladder

Overload.descr: Allow/Disallow interaction with an entity.
Calls a function when the player interacts with a certain entity. Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asEntity)
Calls a function when the player looks at a certain entity. Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asEntity, int alState) - alState 1:looking -1:not looking
Set the position of an entity.
Shows/Hides the mesh of the specified entity.
Enables\Disables the global fog.
Sets global fog color
Sets global fog properties
Set the value of a global (cross-map) float
Set the value of a global (cross-map) int
Set the value of a global (cross-map) string
Sets if standing in darkness turns on night vision and drains sanity.
Enable/Disable an InsanitySet.
Enable/Disable use of inventory.
Adds a message at the bottom of the inventory screen.
Turn on/off a lamp entity.
Draw/Holster the lantern.
Enables/Disables the player's ability to use the lantern.
Sets the function to call when the player uses the lantern. Callback syntax: void Foo(bool abLit)
Locks/Unlocks a level door.
Set the sound played when interacting with a locked level door.
Set the shown message when interacting with a locked level door.
Enables/Disables the ability for the player to make the lever unstuck when using it.
Makes a lever stuck in a certain state. alState 0:not stuck 1:at max -1:at min
Enables/disables flickering on a light.
Enables/disables a light.
Set the value of a local (map-scope) float
Set the value of a local (map-scope) int
Set the value of a local (map-scope) string
Sets the map name shown in save file names.
Displays a message on the screen.
Moves an object to a certain state. afState - 0:closed, 1:opened but other values accepted.
Moves an object to a certain state. afState - 0:closed, 1:opened but other values accepted.
Calls a function when state changes. Callback syntax: void Foo(string &in asEntity, int alState)
Makes a MultiSlider stuck in a certain state.
Activates/Deactives npc behaviour
Enable/Disable the NPC's head following the player's movement.
Enable/Disable player controlled movement.
Enable/Disable crouching
Make the player stand or crouch.
Disables/Enables fall damage.
Sets a multiplier for how much force is applied on the player when jumping.
Set the player health.
Enable/Disable jumping.
Set the player's oil amount.
Set the player's look speed multiplier
Set the player's move speed multiplier
Undocumented. Justine only.
Set Player Position.
Set the player's run speed multiplier
Set the player's sanity level.
Activate/Deactivate a prop and fade it in/out
Activate/Deactivate a prop's effect
Set the health of a prop
Makes a prop stuck in a certain state. alState 0:not stuck 1:at max -1:at min
Activate/Deactivate static physics for a prop
Determines at which distance the radial blur effects appear.
Enables/Disables sanity drain from darkness, monsters, etc.
Enables\Disables the skybox.
Set the color of the skybox.
Set the texture of the skybox.
Closes a swing door.
Activates/Deactivates auto-close behaviour when a door is nearly closed.
Locks/Unlocks a swing door
Enables/disables functionality to let the player escape easier.
Sets if the specified tesla pig should make the screen turn black when the player is close.
Enables/disables the tesla pig proximity sound for the specified manpig.
Determines which loading screen will be shown when changing maps.

Param.name: int alRandomNum - > 1 for random suffix XX

Overload.descr: Sets/Spins the wheel to a certain angle
Enables/Disables the ability for the player to make the wheel unstuck when using it.
Makes a wheel stuck in a certain state. alState 0:not stuck 1:at max -1:at min
Forces an enemy notice and run towards the player.
Enables/Disables the icons when a player has something in focus.
Starts the end credits screen.
Starts the end images that are used in the demo.
Fades the screen to white and shows a text message.
Fades the screen to white.
Forces the player to look at a certain entity until StopPlayerLookAt is used.
Starts a random insanity event from the available sets.
Shakes the screen.
Stops all voices and calls the EffectVoiceOverCallback.
Stops music.
Stops forcing the player to look at a specific entity (See also: StartPlayerLookAt)
Stops all movement of a prop.
Stops a sound.
True if specified string contains the specified sub-string.
Returns the specified substring in a string.
Converts the string to a bool if possible, otherwise returns false.
Converts the string to a float if possible, otherwise returns 0.
Converts the string to an int if possible, otherwise returns 0.
Instantly teleports the enemy to the specified entity.
Instantly teleports the enemy to the specified PathNode.
Instantly teleports the player to the target StartPos area.
Unblocks a hint.
